visits.text: Seaside walk (Marine Parade) or swing bridge over Haulover Creek (Belize City center)

activities.text: Journey Placencia → Belize City by bus/road (return)

days_plan.itin_title: Belize Travel Itinerary: Barrier Reef, Tropical Cayes & Ancient Maya Ruins

visits.text: Walk in Caye Caulker Village and The Split
Swimming and relaxation on the western docks of Caye Caulker
Iguana Reef (west side) for free observation of rays from the shore
Sunset watching north of The Split
Free morning: swimming, docks and beach south of the island

activities.text: Kayak or paddle in The Split channel
Snorkeling trip in the Caye Caulker Marine Reserve (barrier reef)
Panoramic flight over the Great Blue Hole and Lighthouse Reef (from Caye Caulker)
Bike ride along the main street of Caye Caulker
Short boat trip to the nearby reef (light snorkeling)

visits.text: Free exploration of Hopkins village and its waterfront
Beach and walk through coconut groves south of the village

activities.text: Journey Caye Caulker → Belize City (ferry), then bus to Hopkins junction and transfer to the village
Evening Garifuna percussion and singing (drumming) at a local cultural center
Optional nature excursion (weather dependent): Bocawina/Mayflower NP (hiking and waterfalls)

visits.text: Walk on the peninsula: Placencia Sidewalk and beach
Monkey River descent (riverside forest, bird watching and howler monkey observation)
Morning beach time at Placencia Village

activities.text: Monkey River boat trip & manatee observation (from Placencia)
Short boat trip on the reef off the peninsula (light snorkeling)

visits.text: Walk on Front Street and central beach of San Pedro (Ambergris Caye)
Sunset on the municipal pier of San Pedro
Secret Beach (west side of Ambergris Caye)

activities.text: Bicycle or golf cart rental for island exploration
Snorkeling Hol Chan Marine Reserve & Shark Ray Alley off Ambergris Caye
